sourcesContent:
"use client" import { Navbar as BootstrapNavbar, Nav, Container, Button, NavDropdown } from "react-bootstrap" import { LinkContainer } from "react-router-bootstrap" import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext" const Navbar = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth() const handleLogout = () => { logout() window.location.href = "/" } return ( 📚 EduSync
Home Courses About
{user ? ( Name: {user.name || user.username || 'User'} Email: {user.email || 'N/A'} Role: {user.role || 'Student'} Dashboard Logout ) : ( <> )}
) } export default Navbar
